name: The Binibies
description:
The Binibies are cute little creatures that you should satisfy to keep high ratings of your bed&breakfast! But be careful: some may like your furniture choices… and some may not.

Drag and drop furnitures in your map and take care of your guests and their special tastes. The more they are pleased, the more money you will earn at the end of the day, the more you can buy objects and create a nice and welcoming home!

48 H Global Game jam, theme is : what home means to you.

Programmation : Hubert Marret, Tara Zhong

Art Direction : Lara Ploix, Léandre Renouard
Music from : https://freesound.org/people/Greek555/sounds/457342/
